local_intent: Perceive red object, ensure alignment, execute a controlled push, then settle and retreat while keeping target visible.
assumptions: Push path on tabletop is clear for ~0.20 m
End-effector is free; gripper can open
coherence_with_global: Matches global flow: retry detect -> open gripper -> approach/align -> verify visibility -> push 0.20 m at 120 deg -> wait 500 ms -> retreat 0.10 m -> re-verify visibility. Omits MoveAbove to keep minimality while maintaining tabletop push semantics.
